CustomField.description: VVSS: Used to record the estimated number of months the product will take to "pay for itself". It is an output of the Hobson ROI Calculator. If you do not have the ROI Calculator created/implemented, hide this field until you do.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The time in months it will take for a customer's product to "pay for itself". An output of the Hobson ROI Calculator.
CustomField.label: Payback Period (months)
